info.title: Zendesk
info.description: Zendesk builds software for better customer relationships. With multiple products in its portfolio, Zendesk provides a customer service and support ticketing platform that gives businesses the ability to handle customer calls, emails, and other technical inquiries from a unified interface.

get.description: Retrieves item metadata for Zendesk object type
Retrieves item metadata for Zendesk object type
Retrieves all datasets available to the connection
Retrieves Zendesk tables from a site
Retrieves Zendesk tables from a site
Retrieves Zendesk items of a certain Zendesk type (example: 'Ticket')

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to retrieve (default = 512)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).
